home.title: Ahmet Özay
home.subtitle: Journalist
home.description: Özay has traveled, observed, and documented Europe, Turkey, and the post-Soviet world – as correspondent, editor-in-chief, and bureau chief. For decades, he has stood between the discursive spaces of these regions, translating them – without partisanship, but with conviction.
